channel.title: Canadian History Essay Help
channel.description:
I have to write an essay for my Canadian History Class, and I'm having a hard time choosing a topic. I came up with an idea about relating video games to Canadian History via truth. In other words, does the video game portray the correct story that actually occurred in history. I was unable to find any game that has even a level with Canadian soldiers, so I'm here to ask you guys for help. As long as it is something that happened between 1900's-now, I can use it.
Secondly, if you can't help with the above problem, then battles that Canadians fought in would be helpful as well.
If you have any questions about what I am trying to say let me know. Thanks in advance.

yeh, saved Britain’s ass in ww1.[/quote]

item.title: Canadian History Essay Help
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

cristina02:

A title is an introduction to your essay. Its purposes are to draw people in and get them interested in what you have to say. Be sure to always use good punctuation and grammar in your essay.

BANNED

Read full topic

item.title: Canadian History Essay Help
item.dc:creator: @cristina02 cristina02
item.description:
@cristina02 wrote:

I would love to make an essay regarding your topic and I am going to base it from the research I’ve made. But I would just love to suggest you this link in order for you to create a good essay. Be sure you have a correct format as you will pass it to your teacehr.

StudyMode

Canadian History: 1900-Present, Military Participation in world affiars; Lists 4...

judged as the most important of this short list as, after all, how can you define anything unless you have something else to compare it to? Relationships

Read full topic

item.title: Canadian History Essay Help
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

T4_:

Did Canada mobilize in WWI w/ Britain then? (Just curious)

Yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Canadian History Essay Help
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:7, topic:311071”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=407526.msg3009674#msg3009674 date=1256678906]
15th century: settled by French and British people
16th century: above fight over control
17th century: given up by imperial powers
18th - 21st century: maple syrup and ice hockey.
[/quote]
Canada wasn’t fully given up by Britian until 1926, and we were making maple syrup well before that.[/quote]
Did Canada mobilize in WWI w/ Britain then? (Just curious)

Read full topic

item.title: Canadian History Essay Help
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“Tico, post:4, topic:311071”][quote author=cows_be_sacred link=topic=407526.msg3009644#msg3009644 date=1256677912]
It doesn’t necessarily need to be Canadian war does it? You could some how interpret a game which establishes the founding of Canada and then wright about how it gained it’s independence? [1931]
[/quote]

No, it can be about anything in Canadian history from 1900-now. War was just an example.[/quote]
So just write about how Canada was lead to up to its independence. Seems like it’d be a solid essay.

Example:

France founded Canada w/ Quebec as its first city
1900-1931 all about how it lead to the independence

Read full topic
